item.title: Post: I still like UNIX better
item.description: But at least now I have learned enough to actually get stuff done in Windows. That, and enough of my favorite tools have been ported over that I don’t have to feel homesick.
item.content:encoded: But at least now I have learned enough to actually get stuff done in Windows. That, and enough of my favorite tools have been ported over that I don’t have to feel homesick.

item.title: Post: Sticking with Vim
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with several excellent editors for Windows, including UltraEdit and Crimson Editor. The experiments will continue, but for now I am going to stick to a Windows install of Vim. Becoming familiar with Windows doesn’t mean I have to drop everything I already know in the dust!
item.content:encoded: I’ve been experimenting with several excellent editors for Windows, including UltraEdit and Crimson Editor. The experiments will continue, but for now I am going to stick to a Windows install of Vim. Becoming familiar with Windows doesn’t mean I have to drop everything I already know in the dust!
